tool_description: Submits FOIA requests to agencies via email or online portals and provides submission confirmation details.

submission_method.description: Method of submission: email or portal

portal_url.description: URL of agency online submission portal

subject_line.description: Email subject line or portal submission title

error_messages: Invalid submission method: Use either 'email' or 'portal'.
Missing email address: For email submission, provide recipient_email.
Missing portal URL: For portal submission, provide portal_url.
Submission failed: Unable to deliver request. Check email address or portal availability.
Request too large: The formatted request exceeds size limits for the chosen submission method.
usage: Specify submission_method and provide the corresponding recipient_email or portal_url. Include the formatted_request text and subject_line. Returns confirmation of successful submission.
